message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be strategic but fair. I've built genuine connections while making calculated decisions to advance. 

I never targeted anyone without reason, and I've been transparent about my thinking. When I formed alliances, I kept my word. When I had to vote against allies, I did so reluctantly and with explanation.

My approach balanced social awareness with competitive play. I respected everyone's position while advancing my own. 

I ask for your vote based on how I played: honestly, strategically, and with integrity.

# Final Statement from P2

Throughout this journey, I've played with integrity and strategic awareness. I built genuine connections, navigated tough decisions, and adapted when necessary. Every vote I cast was carefully considered, balancing game strategy with respect for each of you.

I've been transparent about my gameplay and honest in my interactions. While P5 played well to reach this point, I believe my balanced approach of strategic thinking and authentic relationship-building makes me deserving of your vote.

I respect each of your perspectives and would be honored to have your support. Thank you for considering my journey.
